about_the_game:
Explore the beginning of BEAR's new mission in ONE BEAR ARMY - DEMO

Take on the role of Bear, a veteran of the elite NAVY BEARS unit in ONE BEAR ARMY – a 2.5D action-adventure game in which you will face the evil Professor Rat and his ruthless army.

YOU ARE THE CHOSEN ONE


As a retired hero, you once again step into the front lines to defeat the plans of Professor Rat. You are the only one who can achieve this goal - you're not just a soldier; you are the last line of defense against the impending chaos - you're the ONE BEAR ARMY.

CHOOSE YOUR STRATEGY


Explore dynamic environments, adapting your approach as you navigate the storyline. Some missions demand a silent touch, requiring you to slip through the shadows unnoticed. Others call for a more explosive resolution, involving the full might of your bear-sized arsenal.

SAVE THE WORLD


ONE BEAR ARMY blends storytelling with heart-pounding action, inviting you to uncover the mysteries behind Professor Rabbitz's sinister plot. Are you ready to stand tall and face the challenges?
